newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn cattle market not established - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn cattle market not established - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were not well tested, compared with Monday's close, USDA said.
Trade was slow and demand moderate. Seller interest light.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 no sales. Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs 70.00.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to last Friday's close. Slaughter steers and heifers steady.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175-1300 lbs west 112.00-113.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs few 104.00 Holsteins - ( grade and weight)
Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales. Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs few west 112.00-113.00.
Wk to Date - 4,900 Week Ago - 20,400 Year Ago - 16,000
